de.unlixx.runpng.png.io

Class PngChunkInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.DataInputStream
          • de.unlixx.runpng.png.io.PngChunkInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PngChunkInputStream
extends java.io.DataInputStream
    PngChunkInputStream based on DataInputStream. This class reads a chunked png file (animated or not) from an input stream.

        public Bitmap32Sequence read(Progress<?> progress)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Reads a Bitmap32Sequence from the input stream.
        Parameters:
        progress - A Progress object to update the visual progress indicator.
        Returns:
        A decompressed but still optimized Bitmap32Sequence object.

      • chunkWedge

        boolean chunkWedge(int nChunkType,
                   int nLen)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Chunk wedge to distribute the input stream to the methods according the chunk type.
        Parameters:
        nChunkType - The chunk type from input.
        nLen - The chunk length from input.
        Returns:
        True if it reached the IEND chunk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an IO problem.
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of problems with the data format.

      • handleChunkCRC

        void handleChunkCRC(int nChunkType,
                    int nCRC,
                    int nCRCRead)
        Checks the calculated checksum against the checksum read from file.
        Parameters:
        nChunkType - The chunk type read.
        nCRC - The calculated checksum.
        nCRCRead - The checksum read from file.

      • getZeroTerminatedString

        int getZeroTerminatedString(byte[] ab,
                            int nOffs,
                            java.lang.StringBuffer sb,
                            java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Reads a string from a given byte array until it finds a zero byte.
        Parameters:
        ab - A byte array to read.
        nOffs - An int containing the offset.
        sb - A StringBuffer object to receive the string data.
        charset - The Charset to use.
        Returns:
        An int containing the index after the zero byte.

      • read_text

        int read_text(int nChunkType,
              int nLen)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Reads a text chunk.
        Parameters:
        nChunkType - An int containing one of PngConstants.tEXt, PngConstants.zTXt or PngConstants.iTXt.
        nLen - An int containing the whole chunk length.
        Returns:
        An int containing the crc checksum.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of IO problems.
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of malformed compression.
        See Also:
        https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11tEXt, https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11zTXt, https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11iTXt, http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/spec/1.2/PNG-Chunks.html, https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3066.txt

      • skipIgnoredChunk

        int skipIgnoredChunk(int nChunkType,
                     int nLen)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Ignores a chunk.
        Parameters:
        nChunkType - An int containing the chunk type.
        nLen - An int containing the whole chunk length.
        Returns:
        An int containing the crc checksum.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of IO problems.
